name: Time Killers: CatchOut
description: CatchOut is a simple “Ball & Paddle” game, but without the paddle. Instead you move the bricks to catch the ball.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Most Intel and AMD cpu's, around 1ghz. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any OpenGL graphics Card DirectX: Version 7.1 Storage: 15 MB available space Additional Notes: This game use about 35mb ram
